types.html:
au beau milieu de

  1. slap bang in the middle of, smack bang in the middle of, right in the middle of
    Synonym: en plein milieu de
    au beau milieu de l'entretien ― right in the middle of the interview
    au beau milieu de la nuit ― right in the middle of the night

Usage notes

[edit]

Often used with temporal expressions; carries a connotation of surprise and incongruity.
trans: slap bang in the middle of, smack bang in the middle of, right in the middle of

title: au beau milieu de
pronunHtml: • IPA(key): /o bo mi.ljø də/
